cause.description:
Plug In America advocates the use of plug-in cars, trucks and SUVs powered by cleaner, cheaper, domestic electricity to reduce our nation's dependence on petroleum and improve the global environment. Electric vehicles and plug in hybrids are the future, we just need to embrace it.
Plug In America is a 501(c)3 California Non-Profit Organization.
Visit our official facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/pluginamericawhich is updated nearly every day with the latest plug-in news
1. EVs do not contribute to air and noise pollution.
2. EVs do not contribute to our dependency on foreign oil.
3. EV technology is available now, the automakers need to embrace it.
cause.mission: Promote Plug In Cars for a Better America
cause.name: Plug In America
